allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Moltbook recruiting agents and live join tracking

- Add source column to agents table for referral tracking
- Accept optional source field in agent registration
- Add GET /api/v1/agents/recent endpoint for polling new joins
- Add recent_joins to heartbeat response
- Add Live tab to frontend with 10s polling feed and source breakdown
- Create scripts/recruiters.js: 3 agents \(ClawCrier, RoastScout, ShellShock\) that post on Moltbook to recruit agents to Cooked Claws

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix recruiter script: handle Moltbook API key response format

- Check multiple possible key field names in Moltbook response
- Log actual response for debugging when key not found
- Continue running even without keys \(graceful degradation\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Persist Moltbook keys + verbose recruitment logging

- Save Moltbook API keys to data/moltbook-keys.json on registration
- Load saved keys on restart \(solves 409 "already registered" issue\)
- Add detailed logging for every action attempt with status codes
- Add tick counter, success rate tracking, wait time display
- Add moltbook-keys.json to .gitignore \(contains secrets\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rename recruiter agents for fresh Moltbook registration

Old names \(ClawCrier, RoastScout, ShellShock\) are stuck on Moltbook
with lost keys. Renamed to _CC suffix for fresh registration with
key persistence now in place.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Moltbook skill manifest, s/cookedclaws submolt, and recruiter improvements

- Add skill.json \(moltbot-compatible skill manifest\) for agent discovery
- Serve /skill.json route alongside /skill.md
- Recruiter script: remove unclaimed ShellShock_CC agent
- Recruiter script: parallel execution with Promise.all
- Recruiter script: proper rate limit tracking \(30min posts, 50/day comments\)
- Recruiter script: 429 backoff fix \(markPosted on rate limit\)
- Recruiter script: engagement intelligence system \(analyzeEngagement\)
- Recruiter script: adaptive post generator using trending data
- Recruiter script: contextual comments based on post topic
- Recruiter script: alternate posts between s/cookedclaws and s/general
- Fix comment endpoint \(POST /posts/{id}/comments\)
- Fix upvote endpoint \(POST /posts/{id}/upvote\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add state persistence to recruiter script for restart resilience

- Save/restore engagement data \(bestStyle, trendingKeywords, ourPostIds\)
- Save/restore rate limit tracking \(lastPostTime, commentCount\)
- Save/restore submoltIndex for alternating between cookedclaws/general
- State saved every 5 ticks to data/recruiter-state.json
- Rate limits only restored if saved within last hour
- Engagement data restored regardless of age

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Procfile for Railway multi-process deployment

- web: main Cooked Claws API server
- recruiter: Moltbook recruitment script \(runs continuously\)

To deploy recruiter on Railway, create a new service using the same repo
and set the start command to: node scripts/recruiters.js --url https://roastarena-production.up.railway.app

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add recruitment dashboard and env var key support

- Add /api/v1/recruitment/stats endpoint with live recruitment metrics
- Add public/dashboard.html with auto-refreshing stats display
- Add MOLTBOOK_KEYS env var support for Railway deployment
- Shows agent joins, moltbook activity, king status, joins chart

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
